description:
11.12 bitplanenoise
Show and measure bit plane noise.

The filter accepts the following options:

bitplane.description: Set which plane to analyze. Default is 1.

filter.description: Filter out noisy pixels from bitplane set above. Default is disabled.

name: bitplanenoise

parameters.description: Set which plane to analyze. Default is 1.
parameters.name: bitplane

parameters.description: Filter out noisy pixels from bitplane set above. Default is disabled.
parameters.name: filter

source:
11.12 bitplanenoise

Show and measure bit plane noise.

The filter accepts the following options:

bitplane

Set which plane to analyze. Default is 1.

filter
